channel.title: [317] Final Destiny X [317]
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i363.photobucket.com/albums/oo71/dman10345/finaldestinyx.gif[/img][/center]
[center][b][u]Information[/u][/b] Revision: 317 Base: Hyperion Client: 317 Deob (with a few edits)
[b][u]Created by[/u][/b] Myself[/center]
[hr]
[center][size=12pt][b]If you read this please leave a comment.[/b][/size][/center] [center]Well first of all thank you for looking at my post! I want to start off first by saying this is my actual first server to dedicate myself to.
At the moment I am the only person working on the server and client, as of right now I plan to keep it that way.
Ok now to get into the actual part of this post that is about RSPS :). The server is run off of Hyperion figuring that it doesn't have crappy delta combat and is packaged a lot better than most other bases. Now I know there are people out there that hear Hyperion and automatically say, "HYPERION SUCKS!!! DELTA FTW!!!", to you guys all I have to say is no, BAD! I have plan for this server and which I will be posting as I go along with the server.[/center]
[hr]
[i][u]Server Started: Tuesday, December 7[/u][/i] As of right now I do not have a lot done, but figured it would be better to create the majority of this post first then edit it as I go. Also I know the banner is a little bare but I plan to edit it with the features I add as I add them.
[left] Green = Finished Orange = Started Red = Not Started [b][u]Skills:[/u][/b] Range: 10% ***Need to adjust the timer a bit, add specials and bolts & X-Bow*** Prayer: 10% ***You can bury bones but xp need to be adjusted and new prayers*** Magic: 2% ***Need to add teleports, ancients, lunars, and adjust timers*** Cooking: 2% ***Can cook some food, need to add select how many to cook and cook more foods*** Woodcutting: 10% ***Basic woodcutting with random amounts of logs, want to add full woodcutting with stumps*** Fletching: 0% Fishing: 10% ***You can only fish with small fishing nets in certain spots*** Firemaking: 0% Crafting: 0% Smithing: 0% Mining: 20% ***Basic mining with any pick any rock but want to make it more versatile for rocks*** Herblore: 0% Agility: 0% Theiving: 10% ***Some stalls work with animations and reward, need to add more stalls and pickpocketing*** Slayer: 0% Farming: 0% Runecrafting: 0% [/left] [hr] [b][u]Minigames:[/u][/b] As of right now there is no minigames, I'm not too worried about these atm until I get the base of the server done. Although don't get me wrong I am going to add them and do have plans for them. I plan on adding some of the basic minigames... Pest Control Fight Pits Fight Cave Barrows Duel Arena Castle Wars Plus I want to add a couple custom minigames... I plan on adding a Boss orientated minigame based on some favorite bosses I also plan on adding a minigame for low level players or skillers
[b][u]Quests:[/u][/b] Quests are going to be somewhat basic once I tinker with the dialogue method a little...
Lost City Desert Treasure Rune Mysteries Monkey Madness Legend's Quest Lunar Diplomacy Knight's Legend Lunar Spirit Hero's Quest Recipe for Disaster
Plus a couple custom quests based on some unlockable features such as ancient prayers. I may also add a couple of the easier quest for newer players such as Cooks Assistant, Black Knights Fortress, or Sheep Shearer. [hr] [b][u]Media:[/u][/b]
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/1zmmudk.gif[/img][IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/143okli.gif[/img]
As of right now I have only a couple pictures or videos worth posting since I am not that far into, but as I get into the server I will post the pictures.
12/07 Daily journal [code]Not much was achieved today because I am having some trouble adding global objects such as stalls or some fishing spots. Other than that I have sharpened up some codes for some of the skills that currently work.[/code]
[b][u]Thanks/Credits:[/u][/b] (No Specific Order) Graham: for Hyperion Primadude: for a lot of help at the beginning, with getting me started Mendorphins: for a tutorial on setting up Hyperion with Eclipse. Which can be found at [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,467475.msg3418042.html#msg3418042]here[/url] Scully: for a little inspiration. The Moparscape Community: for allowing this post and for all the help in the help and tutorial section.
[u]If you notice that there is any spelling or grammar mistakes please don't be afraid to let me know, I plan on keeping this as neat as possible. Also if you wish for me to add something to this post, because you want to know something, or just think it will make the post better either pm me or leave a reply. If you look at this post please comment with something constructive and not just spam.[/u]

item.title: [317] Final Destiny X [317]
item.dc:creator: @RealmofTerror RealmofTerror
item.description:
@RealmofTerror wrote:

[center]

finaldestinyx.gif728×90
[/center]

[center]Information
Revision: 317
Base: Hyperion
Client: 317 Deob (with a few edits)

Created by
Myself[/center]

[hr]

[center][size=12pt]If you read this please leave a comment.[/size][/center]
[center]Well first of all thank you for looking at my post! I want to start off first by saying this is my actual first server to dedicate myself to.

At the moment I am the only person working on the server and client, as of right now I plan to keep it that way.

Ok now to get into the actual part of this post that is about RSPS :). The server is run off of Hyperion figuring that it doesn’t have crappy delta combat and is packaged a lot better than most other bases. Now I know there are people out there that hear Hyperion and automatically say, “HYPERION SUCKS!!! DELTA FTW!!!”, to you guys all I have to say is no, BAD! I have plan for this server and which I will be posting as I go along with the server.[/center]

[hr]

Server Started: Tuesday, December 7
As of right now I do not have a lot done, but figured it would be better to create the majority of this post first then edit it as I go. Also I know the banner is a little bare but I plan to edit it with the features I add as I add them.

[left]
Green = Finished
Orange = Started
Red = Not Started
Skills:
Range: 10% Need to adjust the timer a bit, add specials and bolts & X-Bow
Prayer: 10% You can bury bones but xp need to be adjusted and new prayers
Magic: 2% Need to add teleports, ancients, lunars, and adjust timers
Cooking: 2% Can cook some food, need to add select how many to cook and cook more foods
Woodcutting: 10% Basic woodcutting with random amounts of logs, want to add full woodcutting with stumps
Fletching: 0%
Fishing: 10% You can only fish with small fishing nets in certain spots
Firemaking: 0%
Crafting: 0%
Smithing: 0%
Mining: 20% Basic mining with any pick any rock but want to make it more versatile for rocks
Herblore: 0%
Agility: 0%
Theiving: 10% Some stalls work with animations and reward, need to add more stalls and pickpocketing
Slayer: 0%
Farming: 0%
Runecrafting: 0%
[/left]
[hr]
Minigames:
As of right now there is no minigames, I’m not too worried about these atm until I get the base of the server done. Although don’t get me wrong I am going to add them and do have plans for them. I plan on adding some of the basic minigames…
Pest Control
Fight Pits
Fight Cave
Barrows
Duel Arena
Castle Wars
Plus I want to add a couple custom minigames…
I plan on adding a Boss orientated minigame based on some favorite bosses
I also plan on adding a minigame for low level players or skillers

Quests:
Quests are going to be somewhat basic once I tinker with the dialogue method a little…

Lost City
Desert Treasure
Rune Mysteries
Monkey Madness
Legend’s Quest
Lunar Diplomacy
Knight’s Legend
Lunar Spirit
Hero’s Quest
Recipe for Disaster

Plus a couple custom quests based on some unlockable features such as ancient prayers. I may also add a couple of the easier quest for newer players such as Cooks Assistant, Black Knights Fortress, or Sheep Shearer.
[hr]
Media:

As of right now I have only a couple pictures or videos worth posting since I am not that far into, but as I get into the server I will post the pictures.

12/07 Daily journal

Not much was achieved today because I am having some trouble adding global objects such as stalls or some fishing spots. Other than that I have sharpened up some codes for some of the skills that currently work.

Thanks/Credits: (No Specific Order)
Graham: for Hyperion
Primadude: for a lot of help at the beginning, with getting me started
Mendorphins: for a tutorial on setting up Hyperion with Eclipse. Which can be found at here
Scully: for a little inspiration.
The Moparscape Community: for allowing this post and for all the help in the help and tutorial section.

If you notice that there is any spelling or grammar mistakes please don’t be afraid to let me know, I plan on keeping this as neat as possible. Also if you wish for me to add something to this post, because you want to know something, or just think it will make the post better either pm me or leave a reply. If you look at this post please comment with something constructive and not just spam.

Read full topic
